txt.en: You have encountered a large, brutish Orc deep in Gurz-shâpol.
Gûjah can be found in the deepest reaches of Gurz-shâpol atop his throne.\n\nYou have encountered a large, brutish Orc that must surely be the leader of the Rashat-hai. You should defeat him.
You have triumphed over Gûjah, defeating the Orc-leader and sending his forces into disarray.

The Orcs of the White Mountains rallied behind Gûjah, and through your efforts, his vile leadership has been put to an end. The people of Underharrow and Kingstead shall rest more soundly with such a brutal creature defeated.
A brutal Orc-leader commands the Rashat-hai in Gurz-shâpol, sending out raiding parties to steal away the people and goods of Rohan.

Deep in Gurz-shâpol, you have encountered the mighty Orc-leader, Gûjah. It is unknowable how many have fallen to his blade or to his ilk, but he must be defeated if the people of Rohan are to reach Dunharrow in safety.
You have not yet slain the leader of the Orc forces.
